snippet: The ultramarathon runner Micah True, 58, died from heart disease while on a routine 12-mile run in late March in the mountains of southwestern New Mexico, authorities said.
abstract: Autopsy report reveals that ultramarathon runner Micah True died from heart disease while on a routine 12-mile run in New Mexico in late March 2012.
lead_paragraph: The ultramarathon runner Micah True, 58, died from heart disease while on a routine 12-mile run in late March in the mountains of southwestern New Mexico, authorities said.
